mapper.sql: id, handle_name, handle_type, value_type, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remark

where delete_flag = 0
and handle_name like CONCAT('%', #{obj.baseBean.handleName}, '%')
mapper.insert:
insert into base_handle
id,
handle_name,
handle_type,
value_type,
create_date,
create_by,
update_date,
update_by,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handleType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
#{valueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update base_handle
handle_name = #{handleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_type = #{handleType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
value_type = #{valueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update base_handle set handle_name = #{handleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_type = #{handleType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, value_type = #{valueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(1) as rowTotal from base_handle
order by create_date
